wikipedia_page.main: Ralph Slack Littlewood Allen (30 June 1906 – 9 May 1981) was an English professional footballer. He played as a forward and he was born in Newburn, Newcastle-upon-Tyne, Northumberland.

response: *The record number of goals scored in one season is 33, scored by Ralph Allen in the 1934–35 season.
* May 9 – Ralph Allen, English club footballer (b. 1906)
